name: MATNESS
description:
"If it's at reach, it can kill"

This is Mattness, a game that lets you use the environment to kill your enemies. You will play the role of a detective caught by the mafia for investigating an asylum's shady businesses. They abducted and took everything from you. Escape and get your revenge with whatever is at hand.

This game is currently in development by team of 3 students from ENTI-BCN:

  • Carlos Serrano.
  • Francesc Flórez.
  • Víctor Zaragoza.

If you want to know more and follow the development process, follow us on our social media:

  •  https://www.instagram.com/mattnessthegame/
  • https://twitter.com/mattnessthegame
  • mattnessthegame@gmail.com
